description: The user requests a printable seating plan for their wedding reception; the assistant confirms details, generates a PDF seating chart, uploads it, and returns a download link.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. Thanks for confirming. I’ll generate a PDF seating chart with the current RSVPs, upload it to your event’s document store, and give you a link you can download or print.
